/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, filled with cars and buses, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. In the far distance, the majestic Great Wall of China can be seen, adding a touch of historical grandeur to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting both the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
